column1: Local Foods////Let's begin with what Local Foods is not: it is NOT a crazy-healthy vegan hub
column3: or even the best place to sustain your New Years resolution. They buy local and organic
column4: which means that your money is going to supporting good practices and small business owners; not waistline insurance. Still not sure why people always confuse these two things. Nevertheless
column5: the food is DIVINE. Any sandwich on a fresh pretzel bun will make my day
column6: and their Parmesan kale salad with golden raisins is the perfect supplement to a filling meal.
